name: 許哲奇
objective: This course is a complementary to the Unit Operation I at which the student gained knowledge to fluid mechanics. The covered topics in this course are meant to deal with: compressible fluids, transportation and metering of fluid, and agitation and mixing of liquid.
schedule:
1st week: Introduction
2-4 week: Incompressible Flow
5-8 weeks: Compressible Fluids
9 week: Mid-Term Exam
10 week: Discussion
11-12 weeks: Flow Past Immersed Objects
13-14 weeks: Transportation and Metering of Fluid  
15-16 weeks: Agitation and Mixing of Liquid
17 week: Final Exam 
18 week: Discussion
scorePolicy:
Homework and Quizzes:25% 
Midterm Exam:35%
Final Exam:40%
materials:
" Unit Operations of Chemical Engineering" 7th edition  
  Author: McCabe,Smith and Harriott
consultation: The best way to access curricular consultation is to ask in class or during the break. Students could also arrange a meeting in office hours.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）
